channel.title: life on Shel (Run) Zhou's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in life on Shel (Run) Zhou's Blog

item.title: The Inner Game
item.description: ðŸ”– Two Worlds The calendar years 2022 - 2023 are the milestones for my spiritual growth. I feel and see that there are two systems. The visible one is created by human beings over ages, where everyone sort of finds a path to follow. This path is designed with rules. The second world is invisible, but I feel that it is grander and is related to the reason why I came into this world.
